byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio displays subtle shift toward milder persona in press conference, small indication that concerns about uptick in disapproval ratings on public opinion polls are changing way he presents himself.
lead_paragraph: Since weathering poor approval ratings and attacks on a range of issues, Mayor Bill de Blasio has adopted a subtle shift in tone, perhaps heeding the worries of advisers.

headline.main: After Friction, Renewed Zen for de Blasio
headline.print_headline: After Friction, Renewed Zen for de Blasio

snippet: Since weathering poor approval ratings and attacks on a range of issues, Mayor Bill de Blasio has adopted a subtle shift in tone, perhaps heeding the worries of advisers.
